name: Wonders Abound
description: A stylish action game, made to be fast paced with lots of player freedom in combat. It's still a very early prototype, but I'm working hard to make it more than that! More content, including new moves, enemy types, etc. to come in the future. A controller is recommended, though there are keyboard controls too. Works with Xinput, such as an Xbox360 controller, or a DS4 with DS4Windows.
